The devs? Not the best not the worst. 
The game? Pre ok. Core loop is satisfying and has plenty of diversity.
The community? Noobs are cute, casuals are pretty fun, try hards use meta and be cocky like all games. Forums suck tho.

A very fun game - though it can be tough for new beginners, especially to play killer and to get some bloodpoints for the first time. 
The matchups sometimes are very unbalanced and you get some badass survivors where you sweat the whole match as a killer and still cant manage to kill a survivor.
Best Game ever <3

I play the game occasionally casually.  Its very fun and I actually catch myself screaming as I run for my life, lol!  It can be repetitive that's why it makes a good game to play between other games or when I have limited time i'll squeeze a round or two in. But seriously, it really gets my heart going and only one other game I play does that.  Highly recommend checking this one out.  Its pretty straight forward with no complicated controls or mechanics so its easy to get right into.

It feels like this game was better at release time than now. You are facing more and more bugs, the developers keep rushing updates and dlcs which runs into buggy features being taken down for days. The mmr ranking/balance is still crap, hitboxes are wonky/old. Also they only release new characters and killers only in dlcs, I would not support the developers anymore. Also most of the Perks just seem useless as hell, which feels like they need to fill out survivors and killers 3 main perks. Also their Policy for licenses is questionable = they have to remove the lab map from the stranger things dlc, say wasted money for less feature.

Um jogo maravilhoso se você não tem amor a vida! Grande diversão morrendo no gancho pois seu amigo jurou que dava tempo de terminar um gerador antes de te tirar. Uma diversão maior ainda jogar de killer e ter 3 gerador terminado em 1 minuto por causa da caixa de ferramenta. O jogo é muito bem balanceado, 4 amigos em call destroem um killer e 1 killer contra 4 randoms mata geral. Mas eu ainda não falei do melhor que é o chat no fim da partida em que você tem a oportunidade de ser xingado abundantemente independente da role que você tenha jogado, só paz e amor nesse game!

从二周年开始玩至今3年多，玩过两个号前后加起来1k+h，这个游戏优缺点明显，作为非对称类的游戏一直被模仿但从未被超越，但自从在大陆被禁之后官方就完全不再理会大陆玩家的意见，各个平台的官方账号开在那儿仅仅是单方面向玩家传达官方的消息，提供给大陆玩家的服务器说了多久了官方自己都忘记了吗？大陆玩家只能用着家庭网开着加速器顶着120的延迟玩，动不动就掉线，掉线就是以小时计的禁赛惩罚。外观三天两头出，古书一个接一个，28块钱的dlc要拆分成两个22块钱的dlc来卖，也不知道是和谁学的，吃相过于难看了。还有就是因为车队导致的游戏不平衡结果引发人屠对立，官方有看到吗？大概是看不到。以前官方发布的问卷，我每一次都认认真真答，每一次都会填有8成意愿给朋友推荐此游戏，我会继续玩这个游戏，但现在这个评测，很抱歉我不推荐新玩家入坑，服务器问题、网络问题还有你遇到的不少玩家会直接劝退你。

Easy Anti Cheat is not listed anywhere on the store page. I didn't know this game had anti cheat till it installed automatically on first launch. For those unaware anti cheat has access to view and send ANY FILE from your computer to the anti cheat developers, and can reduce your computers overall performance by 30% even when NOT IN GAME. Obviously, this is something i would have liked CLEARLY STATED on the store page, rather than a blink and you miss it install when you first boot the game up. If you value your privacy or your computers performance, DON'T BUY THIS GAME!

Зашла, увидела жёпу Ромеро и прекрасные усы Феликса. 
Добывала дерево всеми имеющимися маньяками.
Приседала в воротах.
Кемпила на первом повесе.
Опрокидывала Аннушкой топоры в землю-матушку.
Наступала Траппером в свои траппы.
Мансила ровно 8 секунд.
Сама себя теряла в Тэшках, коробках, мейнах.
Кивала лежащим сурвам, закрывая люк.
Анскиллчекала так, что маны приходили с другого конца карты посмотреть на этого долбое*а лично.

Was auch sehr oft passiert wen du das erste mal an den Haken gehängt wirst lässt dein Team dich einfach hängen bis du stirbst.Dann giebt es noch Killer die dich in eine ecke bodyblocken und damit 15 min deines lebens verschwendet hat und das match zuverlassen ist auch nicht ok weil du dann direkt gesperrt wirst. Ich kann mein Hass für dieses spiel nicht in Worte fassen natürlich darf man die 1milionen bugs nicht vergessen Dazu komme ich mit knapp 300 spiel stunden nur noch mit leuten zusammen die alle nicht weniger als 2000 spiel stunden haben Ich hoffe das alle die sich bei der Programmierung beteiligt habe in den Boden schämen und egal wie viele spiel stunden man hat man kann nicht gegen meine aufgelisteten punkte sagen oh es kommt noch besser ich habe jetzt auch noch Survs die vor deinem Haken Teebagen und die ganze zeit linke Maustaste Spammen dieses spiel hebt denn Hass des Menschen hervor dazu duch das neue update werden Spieler die das spiel schon auf 100% und sowie so allen überlegen sind noch mal einen vorteil gegeben und neue Spieler können im spiel garnicht mit halten duch das neue Prestige System das alles nur noch teurer macht

Extremely fun playing as one of the monstrous killers! Really enjoying the game thus far having played a total of 5 hours and counting. I have to be honest about an issue off the bat though, if you plan to play as a survivor you'll need to play as killer first to unlock points to use to level up whichever survivor you chose to play as to at least level 20. The reason is, lower level survivors have a wait time for match making anywhere from 8 to 15 minutes or more... But a survivor at least level 25 to 30+ gets a fast load screen for match making. I have no idea why the developers have not addressed this issue yet, it's a pain. Playing as killers though seems to always get you into a match faster 99.9% of the time even at level 1. What the Developers could do to fix this, is simply have lower level players be temporary upped to the level of whichever other plays in grouping are high level players just for that match. The level matching will fix this issue, and just have them still only get the basic stuff as if they were still lower level during said match. This way they can get fast load times to team up with anyone, but not have any more of an advantage, or less advantage during that grouping match. After the match, they revert to whatever level they were, and then can level up manually from points earned during that match grouping as normal. Something has to change, because as much as I enjoy playing the horror killers, I would also really like to be able to play as a survivor sometimes too. -_~ ...

Other than the match making issue, I've not found any serious game breaking issues, or experienced any series lag, stutter, or crashing either. The game very stable, & also easy to get the hang of quickly whatever the role. I love the fact this game as a starting tutorial area, as it really helps new players learn the ropes of the basic game play from the start!

If you are a horror fan, and love the idea of playing as the killer, or the survivors then this game is for you 100%. I highly recommend it! Also while it can be enjoyed as solo if you play as a killer in match making, I also highly recommend playing with friends on survivor mode as it can mean life, or death LOL Very fun!

UPDATE: "After 11 hours or so playing this thus far, I am happy to say still having a blast, leveling up, & may even buy into the game to unlock some more villains, outfits, and items"! 

I still stand by what I said before, & that is to grab this game today either while on sale, or at the normal cost as well do to the games low cost cheap price either way!

Happy HORROR hunting, or surviving! XD
